thread.title: World Bank Lowers Kenya Growth Forecast
thread.title_full: World Bank Lowers Kenya Growth Forecast - WSJ

author: Matina Stevis
title: World Bank Lowers Kenya Growth Forecast
text:
NAIROBI—A sliding local currency and failure to benefit from lower global oil prices are driving the World Bank to lower growth expectations for Kenya, East Africa’s biggest economy, and one of Africa’s most promising.
In its twice-yearly Kenya Economic Outlook, the World Bank said it was slashing its economic growth forecast for Kenya by 0.6...
